title: Add lock-in champion on the rune selection window
body: Basically allow us to lock-in champions while we are changing runes. This way we can just pick the champion and fully use the time to change up runes without needing to hurriedly close the rune window to lock-in then go back to finish it off. Especially if we are last pick, after lock-in there is only like 10 seconds or something if we are not done with rune selection.
